America’s leading adversaries are working urgently to develop such a computer, which uses the principles of quantum mechanics to operate on data exponentially faster than traditional computers....
Seventy-five years later, America is in another contest just as vital to national security, the economy and even the future of liberal democracy.
During World War II the federal government launched the Manhattan Project to ensure the U.S. would possess the first atomic bomb.
It’s the race to build the first fully operational quantum computer.
